players.name: Bob
memory: You: "Bob is dead, be careful who you trust."
Charlie: "I think we should keep an eye on Bob, given his sudden and ominous statement during the last discussion round."
Diana: "I believe we should vote for Bob tonight, based on the suspicious statement he made during the last discussion round."
Charlie: "I think we should remain vigilant and continue keeping an eye on Bob's actions. His statement during the last discussion round was indeed concerning and warrants further investigation."
You: "Be cautious, but don't jump to conclusions about me. I'm still playing a crucial role in the game."
